org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class VmSchedulerTimeShared

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmScheduler
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmSchedulerTimeShared
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VmSchedulerTimeSharedOverSubscription

    public class VmSchedulerTimeShared
extends VmScheduler
    VmSchedulerTimeShared is a VMM allocation policy that allocates one or more Pe to a VM, and allows sharing of PEs by multiple VMs. This class also implements 10% performance degration due to VM migration. This scheduler does not support over-subscription.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
